title: No, ChromeOS won’t let you refresh your wallpaper every 10 seconds
content:
A new Chrome flag has led some to believe that ChromeOS will soon let you refresh your wallpaper every 10 seconds, but that’s not what’s happening here.

more…

The post No, ChromeOS won’t let you refresh your wallpaper every 10 seconds appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new Chrome flag lead some to believe that ChromeOS will soon refresh your wallpaper every 10 seconds, but that's not what's happening here.
